com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class InsertTextAtPositionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
      • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.InsertTextAtPositionFactory

  • public class InsertTextAtPositionFactory
extends AbstractRuleFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a text at a specific position
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

      • getRule

        public static Rule getRule(java.lang.String textToInsert,
                           int position,
                           boolean fromBegin,
                           int target)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method based on the parameters values return the right rule
        Parameters:
        textToInsert - - text to insert
        position - - position at which insert text
        fromBegin - - if true indicates that the position starts from begin, if false it starts from end
        target - - indicates the filename part to modify (name/extension)
        Returns:
        the right rule, based on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if target is invalid
